Deep Learning for Virtual Screening
===================================

Dependency
----------

- Docker

Method
------

- Multi-task DNN and Graph convolutional network

Usage
-----

    $ cd docker; docker build -t deepchem .

    $ docker run --rm --gpus all deepchem python /deepchem/examples/tox21/tox21_fcnet.py

    Evaluating model
